content: 1hdc in each of the next 26sts 2hdc ch1 2hdc in the corner space * repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting the last corner join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 26hdc per side 2hdc ch1 2hdc in each corner round 1 9 join in any corner space ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc ch2 1sc in the same space *1sc in each of the next 30sts the first stitch may be hidden 1sc ch2 1sc in the corner space * r epeat from * to * 3 more times omitting the last corner join to the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch do not end off stitch count 30sc per side 1sc ch2 1sc in each corner 23 rou nd 20 slip_stitch into the corner space ch2 this counts as the 1st double_crochet 1dc ch2 2dc in the same space *ch1 skip the hidden st dc3tog over the next 3sts ch2 9 times dc3tog over the next 3sts ch1 skip st 2dc ch2 2dc in the corner space repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting the last corner join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch do not end off stitch count 10dc3tog 9 ch2-spaces 2 ch1-spaces per side 2dc ch2 2dc in ea chain corner 24 round 21 slip_stitch in to the corner space ch1 this does not count as a st 1sc ch2 1sc in the same space *1sc in each of the 1st 2sts 2sc in the chain-space 1sc in the dc3tog 10 times 2sc in the last chain- space 1sc in each of the next 2sts 1sc ch2 1sc in the corner space * repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting the last corner join to the top of the beginning single_crochet with a slip_stitch fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 36sc per side 1sc ch2 1sc in each corner round 22 note you may need to hook up for this surface slip_stitch round begin the surface slip stitch away from the corner for a neater finish join around the post of any st in round 18 surface slip_stitch along each st fasten_off and secure ends stitch count 120 surface sl sts 25 rou nd 23 note if you hooked up for the surface sl sts make sure you go back to your normal working hook join in any corner space ch2 this counts as the 1st half_double_crochet 1hdc ch2 2hdc in the same space *skip the hidden st 1hdc in each of the next 37sts 2hdc ch2 2hdc in the corner space * repeat from * to * 3 more times omitting the last corner join to the top of the beginning ch2 with a slip_stitch do not end off stitch count 37hdc per side 2hdc ch2 2hdc in each corner note the aurora square was originally designed for the fatw3 cal if you are worki ng the square for this particular
